title: Updated Android build tools to 19.1
message:
Updated Android build tools to 19.1

* Incremented version code to 5, version name to 1.0.4 (preliminary)

title: Added additional blacklisted ID
message:
Added additional blacklisted ID

* 14 - Network by PrekeshC

title: Forgot to remove blacklist test from onTryUpdate
message: Forgot to remove blacklist test from onTryUpdate

title: Blacklist hit no longer throws RetryException
message:
Blacklist hit no longer throws RetryException

Changed implementation to attempt up to 10 iterations of wallpaper
selection before giving up with a RetryException.

Other:
* RNG instance is now kept as an instance variable instead of recreating
on each update.

title: Added blacklisting for incompatible wallpapers
message:
Added blacklisting for incompatible wallpapers

* Added blacklist of wallpaper IDs, with logic in art source to retry if
a blacklisted wallpaper is selected
* Incremented version to 1.0.3
* Updated to Gradle 1.12

title: Release 1.0.2: CME crash fix
message:
Release 1.0.2: CME crash fix

* Updated to Gradle 1.11
* Updated to Android build tools 19.0.3
* Added local Maven repository to pick up custom Muzei API fork
* Added build instructions to README.md (closes #7)

title: Fix handling of unexpected HTML responses.
message:
Fix handling of unexpected HTML responses.

* Fixes #6 by ensuring the "wallpaper" elements selected has a non-zero
size.
* Added additional conditionals to ensure correct operation even if
malformed wallpaper data is processed.
* The byline will only be set if there is a non-blank "author" element
present.

title: Fix handling of non-ASCII image URLs
message:
Fix handling of non-ASCII image URLs

Fixes #2 by ensuring the URL extracted from the <a> tag is properly
encoded.

title: Fixed loading of properties in Android Studio
message:
Fixed loading of properties in Android Studio

Passed a File object via Gradle's file() method instead of the relative
path.

title: Complete, basic implementation of art source
message: Complete, basic implementation of art source
